name: Fishyphus of the Deep: Legend of the Eight Crystals
name_original: Fishyphus of the Deep: Legend of the Eight Crystals
description:
—— We are the Spawn of the Fish You Could Not Trawl ——

The TRAWLERS have arrived... Take on the role of FISHYPHUS, and use your POWERFUL DASH and HANDY BUBBLES to gather GEMS. The TWISTED CAVE ... the KELP FOREST ... the SLUDGE FACTORY ... scour the murky depths and follow the LEGEND OF THE EIGHT CRYSTALS in order to FIGHT BACK........

—— A DESTRUCTIVE HARVEST OF YOUR OWN ——
